cn.trinea.android.common.service
类 HttpCache

java.lang.Object
  cn.trinea.android.common.service.HttpCache

public class HttpCache
extends java.lang.Object

Http Cache

It applies to get and cache api data from server, like json or xml and so on. It applies to apps like weixin, weibo, twitter, taobao and so on. If want to cache image, please use ImageCache

    Constructor
  • HttpCache(Context) to init cache
    Get data asynchronous
  • httpGet(HttpRequest, HttpCacheListener)
  • httpGet(String, HttpCacheListener)
    Get data synchronous
  • httpGet(HttpRequest)
  • httpGet(String)
  • httpGetString(HttpRequest)
  • httpGetString(String)

嵌套类摘要
static class HttpCache.HttpCacheListener
          HttpCacheListener, can do something before or after HttpGet
 
字段摘要
static java.util.concurrent.Executor THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR
          Default Executor that be used to execute tasks in parallel.

字段详细信息

THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR

public static final java.util.concurrent.Executor THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR
Default Executor that be used to execute tasks in parallel.

构造方法详细信息

HttpCache

public HttpCache(Context context)
方法详细信息

httpGet

public HttpResponse httpGet(HttpRequest request)
http get
    Attentions:
  • Don't call this on the ui thread, it may costs some times. Becaust if not in cache, it get from network synchronous.
  • If you want get data asynchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest, HttpCacheListener)

参数：
httpRequest -
返回：
the response of the url, if null represents http error

httpGet

public void httpGet(java.lang.String url,
                    HttpCache.HttpCacheListener listener)
http get
  • It gets data from cache or network asynchronous.
  • If you want get data synchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest) or httpGetString(HttpRequest)

参数：
url -
listener - listener which can do something before or after HttpGet. this can be null if you not want to do something

httpGet

public void httpGet(HttpRequest request,
                    HttpCache.HttpCacheListener listener)
http get
  • It gets data from cache or network asynchronous.
  • If you want get data synchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest) or httpGetString(HttpRequest)

参数：
request -
listener - listener which can do something before or after HttpGet. this can be null if you not want to do something

httpGet

public HttpResponse httpGet(java.lang.String url)
http get
    Attentions:
  • Don't call this on the ui thread, it may costs some times. Becaust if not in cache, it get from network synchronous.
  • If you want get data asynchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest, HttpCacheListener)

参数：
url -
返回：
the response of the url, if null represents http error

httpGetString

public java.lang.String httpGetString(java.lang.String url)
http get
    Attentions:
  • Don't call this on the ui thread, it may costs some times. Becaust if not in cache, it get from network synchronous.
  • If you want get data asynchronous, use httpGet(String, HttpCacheListener)

参数：
url -
返回：
the response body of the url, if null represents http error

httpGetString

public HttpResponse httpGetString(HttpRequest httpRequest)
http get
    Attentions:
  • Don't call this on the ui thread, it may costs some times. Becaust if not in cache, it get from network synchronous.
  • If you want get data asynchronous, use httpGet(HttpRequest, HttpCacheListener)

参数：
httpRequest -
返回：
the response body of the url, if null represents http error

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(java.lang.String url)
whether this cache contains the specified url.

参数：
url -
返回：
true if this cache contains the specified url and the element is valid, false otherwise.

isExpired

protected boolean isExpired(java.lang.String url)
whether the element of the specified url has invalided

参数：
url -
返回：
true if the element of the specified url has invalided, false otherwise.

clear

public void clear()
Removes all elements from this cache, leaving it empty.

getFromCache

public HttpResponse getFromCache(java.lang.String url)
get from memory cache first, if not exist in memory cache, get from db

参数：
url -
返回：
  • if neither exit in memory cache nor db, return null
  • if is expired, return null, otherwise return cache response
